languages.text: "Конечно, {mf|мальчишка|девчонка} — ведь это я приказала привезти тебя сюда, на мой корабль. Ах, как я жалею об этом решении! Как я жалею, что послушалась своего сенешаля!"

traits.locale_text: "Конечно, {mf|мальчишка|девчонка} — ведь это я приказала привезти тебя сюда, на мой корабль. Ах, как я жалею об этом решении! Как я жалею, что послушалась своего Сенешаля!"
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: "Of course, {mf|boy|girl}, for it was I who gave the order to bring you here, to my ship. Oh, how I rue that decision now! And how I regret heeding the advice of my Seneschal!"
languages.original_text: "Конечно, {mf|мальчишка|девчонка} — ведь это я приказала привезти тебя сюда, на мой корабль. Ах, как я жалею об этом решении! Как я жалею, что послушалась своего сенешаля!"

traits.locale_text: "Of course, {mf|boy|girl}, for it was I who gave the order to bring you here, to my ship. Oh, how I rue that decision now! And how I regret heeding the advice of my Seneschal!"
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

traits.locale_text: "Of course, {mf|boy|girl}, for it was I who gave the order to bring you here, to my ship. Oh, how I rue that decision now! And how I regret heeding the advice of my Seneschal!"
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

traits.locale_text: "Of course, {mf|boy|girl}, for it was I who gave the order to bring you here, to my ship. Oh, how I rue that decision now! And how I regret heeding the advice of my Seneschal!"
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

traits.locale_text: "Of course, {mf|boy|girl}, for it was I who gave the order to bring you here, to my ship. Oh, how I rue that decision now! And how I regret heeding the advice of my Seneschal!"
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: “当然了，{mf|小伙子|小姑娘}，因为下令把你带到我的船上的人，就是我本人。噢，如今我真的非常后悔这个决定！我真的非常后悔听从了总领的建议！”
languages.original_text: "Of course, {mf|boy|girl}, for it was I who gave the order to bring you here, to my ship. Oh, how I rue that decision now! And how I regret heeding the advice of my Seneschal!"

traits.locale_text: “当然了，{mf|小伙子|小姑娘}，因为下令把你带到我的船上的人，就是我本人。噢，如今我真的非常后悔这个决定！我真的非常后悔听从了总领的建议！”
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: «Claro que sí, muchach{mf|o|a}, fui yo quien ordenó que se te trajera aquí, a mi nave. Ah, ¡cuánto lamento esa decisión ahora! ¡Y cuánto lamento haber hecho caso a mi Senescal!».
languages.original_text: "Of course, {mf|boy|girl}, for it was I who gave the order to bring you here, to my ship. Oh, how I rue that decision now! And how I regret heeding the advice of my Seneschal!"

traits.locale_text: «Claro que sí, muchach{mf|o|a}, fui yo quien ordenó que se te trajera aquí, a mi nave. Ah, ¡cuánto lamento esa decisión ahora! ¡Y cuánto lamento haber hecho caso a mi Senescal!».
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: 「もちろんよ、あなたを私の船に連れてくるように命じたのは私なのだから。ああ、今になってその決断を悔やんでいるわ！家令長の忠告に耳を貸さなかったことを後悔しているの！」
languages.original_text: "Of course, {mf|boy|girl}, for it was I who gave the order to bring you here, to my ship. Oh, how I rue that decision now! And how I regret heeding the advice of my Seneschal!"

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんよ、あなたを私の船に連れてくるように命じたのは私なのだから。ああ、今になってその決断を悔やんでいるわ！家令長の忠告に耳を貸さなかったことを後悔しているの！」
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: "Natürlich, {mf|Junge|Mädchen}, denn ich habe befohlen, Euch herzubringen, auf mein Schiff. Oh, wie ich diese Entscheidung inzwischen bereue! Und wie ich es bereue, auf meinen Truchsess gehört zu haben!"
languages.original_text: "Of course, {mf|boy|girl}, for it was I who gave the order to bring you here, to my ship. Oh, how I rue that decision now! And how I regret heeding the advice of my Seneschal!"

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich, {mf|Junge|Mädchen}, denn ich habe befohlen, Euch herzubringen, auf mein Schiff. Oh, wie ich diese Entscheidung inzwischen bereue! Und wie ich es bereue, auf meinen Truchsess gehört zu haben!"
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: « Évidemment, {mf|petit morveux|petite morveuse},puisque c'est moi qui ai donné l'ordre de vous amener ici, sur mon vaisseau. Si vous saviez combien je regrette ma décision ! Je me mords les doigts d'avoir suivi les conseils de mon sénéchal ! »
languages.original_text: "Of course, {mf|boy|girl}, for it was I who gave the order to bring you here, to my ship. Oh, how I rue that decision now! And how I regret heeding the advice of my Seneschal!"

traits.locale_text: « Évidemment, {mf|petit morveux|petite morveuse},puisque c'est moi qui ai donné l'ordre de vous amener ici, sur mon vaisseau. Si vous saviez combien je regrette ma décision ! Je me mords les doigts d'avoir suivi les conseils de mon sénéchal ! »
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: "Haklısın {mf|oğlum|kızım} zira buraya, gemime gelmeni emreden bendim. Çok pişmanım! Seneşalimin tavsiyelerine kulak açmamalıydım!"
languages.original_text: "Of course, {mf|boy|girl}, for it was I who gave the order to bring you here, to my ship. Oh, how I rue that decision now! And how I regret heeding the advice of my Seneschal!"

traits.locale_text: "Haklısın {mf|oğlum|kızım} zira buraya, gemime gelmeni emreden bendim. Çok pişmanım! Seneşal'imin tavsiyesini dinleyeceğime kulaklarım düşseydi!"
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit
